full_description:
XTRA B75 Pro In-Ear Earphone

The XTRA B75 Pro is an in-ear earphone designed with a 3.5mm plug type, it is compatible with a wide range of devices. The earphone features a frequency range of 20Hz to 20KHz, ensuring clear and detailed sound reproduction across various genres of music. It comes with a 1.2m cable length, providing ample flexibility and freedom of movement. The built-in microphone allows for convenient hands-free calling and voice control. With a sensitivity of (96±3dB) and a 10mm driver, the XTRA B75 Pro delivers immersive audio with rich bass and crisp highs. The impedance of 16 Ω ensures efficient power usage and compatibility with most devices. The earphone includes remote buttons for easy control of volume, playback, and call management.
